description: A highly modular Framework to write Blazor Applications with a husstle free vertical sliced architecture - Easy. Flexible. Focused.
releaseNotes:
## 4.0.0 (2023-09-17)
* build: use latest net8.0 preview sdk ([bebfead](https://github.com/vertiq-io/Vertiq/commit/bebfead))
